topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: libircclient
short_description: libircclient is a small but powerful library, which implements client-server IRC protocol. It has all features needed to create your own IRC client or bot, including multi-threading support, sync and async interfaces, CTCP/DCC support, colors, SSL connections and so on.
